faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers about pricing, selling, and coverage.
faq.q1: How does the car price prediction work?
faq.a1: Our AI model analyzes thousands of car listings and uses factors like make, model, year, mileage, condition, and location to estimate market value. You get a predicted price range with a confidence score to help you make informed decisions.
faq.q2: How do I sell my car through your platform?
faq.a2: Go to the Sell section, enter your car details, upload photos, set your price (you can use our prediction as a guide), and publish. Buyers can contact you via message or phone. We serve Erbil, Baghdad, Sulaymaniyah, and the wider Iraq & Kurdistan region.
faq.q3: How accurate is the price prediction?
faq.a3: Our model is trained on real market data and typically provides estimates within a reasonable range of actual sale prices. Accuracy depends on data quality and market conditions. Use the confidence meter and price range as a guide, and consider getting a professional inspection for high-value cars.
faq.a4: We operate across Iraq and the Kurdistan region, including Erbil, Baghdad, and Sulaymaniyah. Price predictions and marketplace listings are available for these areas. If you're outside these cities, contact us to check availability.
faq.q5: How can I get support in Arabic or Kurdish?
faq.a5: Our team is fluent in Arabic, Kurdish, and English. Contact us via WhatsApp, phone, or email in your preferred language. We're here to help with pricing, buying, selling, or any technical questions.

comparison.title: Why Choose Us?
comparison.subtitle: Compare with other car price tools

q1.question: Is this really free?
q1.answer: Yes! 100% free forever. No credit card, no subscription, no hidden fees. We believe everyone should have access to accurate car price predictions.

q2.question: How accurate are the predictions?
q2.answer: Our AI model achieves 99.96% accuracy (RÂ² score) with an average error of only $386. This is industry-leading precision powered by advanced machine learning.

q3.question: Do I need to create an account?
q3.answer: No! You can use all features without signing up. However, creating a free account lets you save your predictions and compare cars later.

q4.question: What data do you use?
q4.answer: We train our model on 60,000+ real car listings from the Iraqi and Kurdish markets, ensuring accurate regional pricing predictions.

q5.question: Can I predict prices for multiple cars?
q5.answer: Yes! Use our batch processing feature to upload a CSV file with multiple cars and get predictions for all of them at once.

q6.question: Is my data secure?
q6.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and never share your data with third parties. Your privacy is our priority.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: CarWise ("we", "our", or "the service") is a car price prediction and car-related platform operating only in Iraq and the Kurdistan Region. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use CarWise.

informationYouProvide.title: Information You Provide
informationYouProvide.items: Car photos uploaded for price prediction or listings|Saved predictions, favorites, and history (only if you choose to create an account)
informationYouProvide.footer: You can use CarWise without logging in. Login is required only to save predictions, history, and favorites.

informationCollectedAutomatically.title: Information Collected Automatically
informationCollectedAutomatically.items: IP address|Device information (browser type, operating system)|Basic usage data (pages visited, actions taken)

howWeUseInfo.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInfo.description: We use the collected information to:
howWeUseInfo.items: Provide accurate car price predictions|Improve our services, performance, and user experience|Save user preferences, history, and favorites (for logged-in users)|Monitor usage and analyze trends|Detect, prevent, and fix technical or security issues

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: CarWise uses cookies and similar technologies for the following purposes:
cookies.items: Essential cookies â€“ required for the website to function correctly|Analytics cookies â€“ to understand how users interact with the platform|Marketing cookies â€“ to show relevant promotions or advertisements
cookies.footer: You can control or disable cookies through your browser settings.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. We may share limited information only when:
informationSharing.items: Required by law or legal authorities|Necessary to protect the rights, safety, or security of CarWise and its users|Using trusted analytics or infrastructure services to operate and improve the platform

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We use appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your information against unauthorized access, loss, misuse, or disclosure.

However, no online service can be guaranteed to be 100% secure.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.items: Personal and usage data are retained only as long as necessary to provide our services|If you delete your account, saved data will be deleted or anonymized unless legal retention is required

childrenAndAgeUse.title: Children & Age Use
childrenAndAgeUse.content:
CarWise is available to users of all ages. We do not knowingly collect sensitive personal information from children.

We encourage parents or guardians to supervise children's use of the service when applicable.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.items: Access your stored information|Request correction or deletion of your data|Control cookie preferences through your browser
yourRights.footer: Requests can be made by contacting us directly.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.

Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to CarWise. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the CarWise website, application, and services (collectively, the "Service"). By accessing or using CarWise, you agree to be bound by these Terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By using CarWise, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms.

If you do not agree, you must not use the Service.

descriptionOfService.title: 2. Description of the Service
descriptionOfService.description: CarWise is a car-related platform that provides:
descriptionOfService.items: Car price predictions (estimates only)|Saving predictions, favorites, and history|Car listings and related features|User interactions and content uploads
descriptionOfService.footer: The Service is free to use. Paid features may be introduced in the future, and users will be informed in advance.

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility
eligibility.content:
CarWise is available to users of all ages.

Users are responsible for ensuring that their use of the Service complies with applicable local laws.

accountRegistration.title: 4. Account Registration
accountRegistration.items: You may use some features without creating an account.|An account is required to save predictions, favorites, history, or post content.|You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.|You may delete your account at any time.
accountRegistration.footer: CarWise reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms.

pricePredictionsDisclaimer.title: 5. Price Predictions Disclaimer
pricePredictionsDisclaimer.content:
All car prices provided by CarWise are estimates only. They are generated using algorithms and market data and do not guarantee actual market value.

CarWise is not responsible for financial decisions, losses, or transactions made based on these predictions.

userContent.title: 6. User Content
userContent.items: Car photos|Descriptions, notes, and other related content
userContent.footer:
You retain ownership of your content. By posting content, you grant CarWise a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute the content for operating and improving the Service.

CarWise may remove any content that violates these Terms or applicable laws.

prohibitedUses.title: 7. Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.items: Violate any applicable law or regulation|Upload illegal, harmful, or misleading content|Use automated systems, scraping, or bots|Transmit malware, viruses, or malicious code|Impersonate another person or entity|Abuse, disrupt, or overload the Service

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.description: CarWise may suspend or terminate your access at any time if:
termination.items: You violate these Terms|Your actions harm the Service or other users
termination.footer: You may stop using the Service and delete your account at any time.

intellectualProperty.title: 9. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content:
All content, branding, and software related to CarWise (excluding user content) are the property of CarWise.

They may not be copied, modified, or distributed without permission.

disclaimerOfWarranties.title: 10. Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimerOfWarranties.content: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available". CarWise makes no warranties regarding accuracy, reliability, or availability of the Service.

limitationOfLiability.title: 11. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content:
To the maximum extent permitted by law, CarWise shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

This includes financial losses arising from the use of the Service.

governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Iraq and the Kurdistan Region.

changesToTerms.title: 13. Changes to These Terms
changesToTerms.content:
CarWise may update these Terms from time to time.

Continued use of the Service after changes means you accept the updated Terms.

contactInformation.title: 14. Contact Information
contactInformation.description: If you have any questions about these Terms, contact us at:
